FuncDef:
The shutdown command shuts down a BFD session. After a BFD session is shut down, the session enters the AdminDown state.
The undo shutdown command starts a BFD session. The shutdown command shuts down a BFD session. After a BFD session is shut down, the session enters the AdminDown state. The undo shutdown command starts a BFD session. By default, a BFD session is started.
ExtraInfo: You can run the shutdown command to shut down the BFD session that detects a link in the following situations:
